byline.original: By MICHAEL M. GRYNBAUM and JAMES C. McKINLEY Jr

abstract: Warrant is issued for arrest of OTR Media chief executive Ari Noe after he fails to appear in court to begin 15-day sentence for misdemeanor sexual abuse; Noe is one of New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio's leading supporters in Orthodox Jewish community, and de Blasio's aides say mayor was only recently informed about Noe's trial and conviction.
lead_paragraph: Ari Noe, who was found guilty in 2013, helped organize Mayor Bill de Blasio’s two-day visit to Israel in October.

headline.main: De Blasio Backer, Convicted of Sexual Abuse, Fails to Show Up for Jail Sentence
headline.print_headline: Mayoral Ally Is a No-Show for Jail Over Sexual Abuse

snippet: Ari Noe, who was found guilty in 2013, helped organize Mayor Bill de Blasio’s two-day visit to Israel in October.
